function.name: QuarterNumber
function.description: Returns the fiscal quarter of a date as a number
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value"}]

function.name: QuarterName
function.description: Returns the fiscal quarter of a date in the typical Q1, ..., Q4 style
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value"}]

function.name: MonthName
function.description: Returns the name of the month. Function can take a formatted date string, a Date or DateTime value, or an integer value as input
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDateOrNumber","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, a Date or DateTime value, or an integer value"}]

function.name: WeekOfYear
function.description: Returns the ordered number of the week in the year that a date occurs on, from 1 to 53
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the week of the year for"}]

function.name: DayOfWeekName
function.description: Returns the name of the weekday of a date
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the day of the week for"}]

function.name: DayOfWeekNumber
function.description: Returns the ordered number of the weekday that a date occurs on, from 1 (Sunday) to 7 (Saturday)
function.arguments_json: [{"Name":"inputDate","Required":true,"Description":"A formatted date string, Date value, or DateTime value representing the date to get the day of the week for"}]
